name: Lance Commander
description:
Destiny Beckons.

The creation of the jump drive was the beginning of human expansion into space. Rapid migration ensued, with permanent colonies on terraformed planets and immense Starbases in distant galaxies.

Large corporations began to form, in attempts to harvest the vast resources and raw materials available and necessary for continued expansion and sustainability.

Deep space exploration in huge self-sustaining mining ships for rare minerals became extremely profitable for these companies as trade and commerce grew between colonies and an intricate economy started to form.

The Orion Starbase serves as a permanent outpost in the furthest reaches of human explored of space. It serves as a headquarters for a number of corporations and has a large fleet of commercial vessels including carriers and tankers.

Fresh out the academy, you await your first posting.

*Requires Xbox 360 controller to play.
